response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your business operations significantly. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it is worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, we are offering you the chance to secure this product exclusively for yourself at the same value, $10,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be making a strategic investment that will undoubtedly pay off in the long run. Please let us know your decision soon so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 10000}
